ModMetaData.name: Real Ruins - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: telewre
ModMetaData.description: Generates ruin templates based on other players' real bases (This is the dev version of Real Ruins. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
